reviewText:
The lessons are short and to the point - the advice is blunt and useful.

I've used this for three days and feel like i've made excellent progress. I was going to get professional lessons but with the product i feel i don't need them at the moment. I'm only half way through DVD 1 out of 3 and my friends are stunned at my progress.

I recommend this product to any beginner drummers who love Christ and want to worship God with drums.

It's exciting learning drums with this.
